column1: Iranian Gen. Soleimani supported terrorist groups like Hezbollah around the world.    I asked homeland security experts what dangers they pose Americans here at home.   Watch what they said. https://t.co/v4FRAWN2zJ

@CBP facilities are not meant to handle the influx of children and families. I asked @DHSGov what they plan to do to prevent child deaths and ensure the safety of everyone in their custody.  📺👇🏽 https://t.co/mgZpANlgey

There are about 400 homeless veterans w/o shelter in Orange County. What’s worse is the resource to help them exist right now.  I’ve worked hard to protect & expand housing vouchers for vets but we need help from our cities & counties to ensure those in need know help exists. https://t.co/lYxG2OL52K

For the past 3 years we have seen this Admin continuously implement immigration policies designed to deter legal asylum seekers by forcing them to endure demeaning and inhumane treatment. My colleagues and I will not tolerate the continued bullying of families fleeing violence.

By forcing legitimate asylum seekers—including women children & families—to remain in Mexico in conditions that threaten their health & safety we are needlessly prolonging their suffering. Unfortunately for this Admin that has too often been their goal. This cannot stand.

Today my @HouseJudiciary colleagues and I are announcing an investigation into the Administration's dangerous "Remain in Mexico" policy.  For refugees and migrants fleeing violence and crime in Latin America there is no alternative to the safety of American soil.

I'm proud of my work to expand federal housing vouchers for veterans but too many of our bravest are sleeping on our streets.   Tonight we went a step further & passed the Veteran HOUSE Act which will help keep veterans at risk of becoming homeless from ending up on the streets.
Americans do not want another war in the Middle East. We must listen to our fellow Americans.

Today’s vote to limit the President’s ability to start a war and protect Congress’s sole power to declare war ensures that the People’s House is directly involved in any action that may move us closer to war as required by the Constitution.

The region continues to be critically unstable & has led to the creation of ISIS an enemy we could never have imagined when the war began in 2003. We must heed these lessons & not blindly charge into a shortsighted war that will take more of our children & less safe world.

After 17 years of combat operations in Iraq and 19 years of continuous war I am forced to ask ‘Do we want another war in the Middle East?’ The Global War On Terror has cost the United States trillions of dollars and 6790 American lives while grievously wounding 52000 others.

... and curbing Iran’s aggression. While we can universally agree that Soleimani deserved what he got his death represents a deeply dangerous departure from current foreign policy goals in a volatile part of the world.

Qasem Soleimani as an Iranian government official and military leader spent the last two decades leading and empowering terrorist groups that have killed Americans and innocent people around the world. His death marks a significant step in addressing regional violence...

Iranian General Qasem Soleimani built the world’s largest terrorist network with groups like Hezbollah.  I’m calling for immediate classified hearings in @HomelandDems to learn if groups like Hezbollah can retaliate on American soil & what we must do to ensure the USA is secure.

We pray as a nation for @repjohnlewis.   From the Edmund Pettus Bridge to the steps of the Lincoln Memorial to the halls of Congress John has fought and overcome his entire life.   We are with him as he battles this latest challenge—every step of the way. https://t.co/PplyhepegI
Happy New Year! Wishing health happiness and prosperity to everyone. https://t.co/Za4wAh2Rc1
It has been seven years since Sandy Hook.   No words will ever capture the pain of that day. https://t.co/BCKALD2jIB
I will never stop working for the American people. We must protect our democracy. No one is above the law including the President.
This week has been a very busy week. Congress passed new legislation to lower prescription drug costs and expand care for seniors protect our farmworkers and farmers and fully fund our military.

Unfortunately our President has again solicited foreign interference in our democratic elections. After reviewing all the evidence presented the President has given me no choice. I must vote to impeach.
This is a sad day. I do not take impeachment lightly. I’ve had the opportunity to vote to impeach the President before and have voted NO on all prior occasions.
I Ask God For Wisdom And Guidance In Uniting Our Great Nation.”  Watch my statement here. 👇🏽 https://t.co/damG0Bz3ns

Mom: Cleaned hotel rooms for a $1.60/hr  Dad: Worked at a paper mill  Me: United States Congressman serving on @HouseJudiciary   From the streets of Anaheim to the halls of Congress—their love & sacrifice propelled me here. https://t.co/QWHfRfmwkQ

Sadly the evidence shows our President solicited the intervention of a foreign nation in our elections.   He urged foreign interference in exchange for a White House meeting & nearly $400m taxpayer dollars in military aid.  Watch my questioning here.  👇🏽👇🏽👇🏽 https://t.co/JHoBxhhT9U

For me and my family the Holidays are a time to celebrate the birth of migrant in a manger.   Yet instead of celebrating life and love—for the second year in a row—this season will again be plagued by the death of a child in @CBP custody.  Aren’t we better than this? https://t.co/gPf7kzoMtU
Yet another senseless act of gun violence against our servicemembers. My heart breaks for the victims and their families. Thank you to our first responders and emergency personnel.

The Farm Workforce Modernization Act was passed by @HouseJudiciary!   This bill: ✅ Protects our Farms & Farmers ✅ Provides Work Permits For Farmworkers ✅ Creates A Pathway To Citizenship For Farmworkers  The Farmworkers in our fields have earned a seat at our table!

I’m proud to have voted to take the first step in federally descheduling cannabis.  The MORE Act will right the wrongs of the drug war & move us forward.  It’s time to invest in medical cannabis & allow consenting adults to make their own decisions.  Next stop the House Floor. https://t.co/TpunKn6Qfe
Today we remember the transgender people throughout our communities whose lives have been taken simply for living their identity.  Too many lives have been lost. These attacks must end.   #TDOR

The wage gap harms our economy and our communities.  The average Latina woman makes 54¢ on the dollar over their life time. This hurts women and hurts our community.   We must pay Latinas their worth! #LatinaEqualPayDay

As more states fully legalize cannabis it’s time for Congress to decriminalize it. The MORE Act will:  ✅ Deschedule cannabis ✅ Expunge low-level offenses  ✅ Create 5% federal tax on cannabis  I’m proud to be a co-sponsor of this bill. It’s time to move forward. https://t.co/85cnQUuwJF

Congratulations to the Sikh Community on the 550th Birthday celebration of Guru Nanak Devji founder of Sikh religion!   The Sikh Community has made many contributions to American society in all the fields!

25 years ago California passed Prop. 187 a painful anti-immigrant law.   Fighting Prop 187 compelled me to become politically active and to run for public office.    Today I am honored to represent Orange County as your Congressman and continue the fight in Washington. https://t.co/WosQlzsvQq

Climate change is real. 🌎   As the greatest economy in the world we need to lead by example and show that strong climate rules do not mean weak economies.   We need to be part of the Paris climate accord to help create the rules. Only together can we save our world. https://t.co/sGdpqwOcoL

Today’s vote outlines the ground rules for the impeachment investigation to ensure a fair open and public process. The American people must have full faith in this process.   Today’s vote ensures they will.

For the past few weeks Republican and Democratic Members of the House Intelligence Foreign Affairs and Oversight Committees have investigated allegations surrounding President Trump. These allegations are serious and the House is taking them seriously.
The threat is real.  We must do more. https://t.co/8V1mYtFBGp
These individuals are integral to our society and have helped make America the breadbasket of the world. They have earned a seat at our table.

Countless immigrants come to the United States and do jobs most Americans won’t. For decades these individuals have been treated like criminals while our economy and farmers depend on them. Without immigrants in our fields our tables would be bare and our markets empty.
I am proud to join @RepZoeLofgren in introducing the Farm Workforce Modernization Act which will finally treat our immigrant farmworkers with the dignity and respect they have earned.

Very excited to announce my bill to improve women veterans’ healthcare within the @DeptVetAffairs was passed by @VetAffairsDems.  Thank you @RepBrownley for including my legislation in the #DeborahSampsonAct and for championing the health and safety of all our warriors.
Today I voted to recognize the atrocities committed against the Armenian people from 1915 to 1923.   Genocide can never be ignored and never forgotten.
I’m leading a @HouseJudiciary hearing on improving the immigration process for immigrants serving in our military and ending the deportation of veterans.   WATCH IT LIVE: https://t.co/LvXUxgjCAq

Today I voted to address the vaping crisis in our schools.  The bipartisan bill closes loopholes that let kids circumvent age verification by buying e-cigarette online.   Closing this loophole will keep vaping products away from children while ensuring access for adults.
36 years ago 220 Marines and 21 servicemembers lost their lives in a terror attack in Beirut. Today we remember their sacrifice. https://t.co/9OeC1Uo5zZ

Russia and Iran are already working to influence the 2020 elections. They aren’t alone.  Our adversaries are plotting to interfere in our elections and undermine our democracy.   We must pass the #SHIELDAct and protect our democracy from foreign interference. https://t.co/gA9LkI5xhM
No survivor of rape or sexual assault should be denied justice because their local police department can’t afford to process their rape kit. Period. #PassDSA

17 years later I am proud to vote to reauthorize the #DebbieSmith Act—a critical federal program aimed at ending the #RapeKit backlog altogether. This bill ensures local police departments in every state have the resources they need to process every rape kit.
When I served #OrangeCounty in the California State Assembly one of my first bills to become law eliminated the statute of limitations on sex crimes to ensure no rapist got away.

Sad news this morning. @RepCummings has left us.   My deepest condolences to his family and loved ones as well as the people of Maryland who have depended on Elijah all these years.   The country has lost a champion for truth justice and the American way. He will be missed.

.@HouseDemocrats continue to fight for the American people. Tonight we passed legislation to:  ✅ Help veterans struggling with homelessness;  ✅ Share the stories of our fallen soldiers in veteran cemeteries.  That brings the total to 295 bills passed by Congress this year!

Congress must act quickly and judiciously to ascertain all the facts about this egregious abuse of power by a sitting President. No one is above the law.
Today I stand shoulder to shoulder with @SpeakerPelosi and formally announce my support for an impeachment inquiry of the President of the United States.
We have addressed many issues but the President’s effort to request assistance from the Ukrainian government for his political gain is something entirely different.
No one is above the law. For the past nine months I have joined my colleagues on the House Judiciary Committee in investigating the many abuses of power levied against this President.

Hurricane #Dorian is careening towards Florida but @realDonaldTrump would rather deport working families than protect yours.   Instead of preparing he raided @FEMA’s emergency fund to fuel his deportation machine.  2018 saw 14 disasters & cost $300b. How will we rebuild in 2019?

.@realDonaldTrump plans to end limits on child detention allowing @DHSgov to hold children indefinitely.  He will spend billions to jail kids but won’t give them flu shots blankets or beds.  Jailing kids is wrong. It’s expensive. And it does nothing to help our border crisis.

.@realDonaldTrump announced he will end ALL foreign aid worsening the global refugee crisis.   Mr. President. Our neighbors’ houses are on fire. We can either help put out the fire and rebuild their economies or expect them to migrate north.   What’s it going to be?

.@realDonaldTrump has released his new “public charge” rule.   This rule forces struggling families to choose between feeding their kids or becoming a US citizen.  This is the Admin’s latest attempt to limit legal immigration & redefines who we are—a nation of immigrants.

Proud to cosponsor @RepJerryNadler & @SenKamalaHarris’s Marijuana Opportunity Act. It will  ✅Decriminalize marijuana ✅Expunge marijuana convictions ✅Create economic opportunities for communities  This is the most comprehensive cannabis reform bill to ever come before Congress!
